00019 #ifndef _RTAI_USI_H
00020 #define _RTAI_USI_H
00021 
00022 #ifndef __KERNEL__
00023 
00024 #include <asm/rtai_usi.h>
00025 #include <asm/rtai_atomic.h>
00026 #include <asm/rtai_srq.h>
00027 
00028 #ifdef __cplusplus
00029 extern "C" {
00030 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00031 
00032 static inline int rt_startup_irq(unsigned int irq)
00033 {
00034         return (int)rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _STARTUP_IRQ, irq);
00035 }
00036  
00037 #define rt_shutdown_irq(irq) \
00038         do { rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _SHUTDOWN_IRQ, irq); } while (0)
00039  
00040 #define rt_enable_irq(irq) \
00041         do { rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _ENABLE_IRQ, irq); } while (0)
00042  
00043 #define rt_disable_irq(irq) \
00044         do { rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _DISABLE_IRQ, irq); } while (0)
00045  
00046 #define rt_mask_and_ack_irq(irq) \
00047         do { rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _MASK_AND_ACK_IRQ, irq); } while (0)
00048  
00049 #define rt_ack_irq(irq) \
00050         do { rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _ACK_IRQ, irq); } while (0)
00051  
00052 #define rt_unmask_irq(irq) \
00053         do { rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _UNMASK_IRQ, irq); } while (0)
00054  
00055 #define rtai_cli() \
00056         do { rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _DISINT, 0); } while (0)
00057 
00058 #define rtai_sti() \
00059         do { rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _ENINT, 0); } while (0)
00060 
00061 #define rtai_save_flags_and_cli(flags) \
00062         do { flags = (unsigned long)rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _SAVE_FLAGS_CLI, 0); } while(0)
00063  
00064 #define rtai_restore_flags(flags) \
00065         do { rtai_srq(USI_SRQ_MASK | _RESTORE_FLAGS, flags); } while (0)
00066 
00067 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00068 #define rt_spin_lock(lock) \
00069         do { while (atomic_cmpxchg(lock, 0, 1)); } while (0)
00070  
00071 #define rt_spin_unlock(lock) \
00072         do { *(volatile int *)lock = 0; } while (0)
00073 
00074 #else
00075 #define rt_spin_lock(lock);
00076 
00077 #define rt_spin_unlock(lock);
00078 #endif
00079  
00080 #define rt_spin_lock_init(lock) \
00081         do { *(volatile int *)lock = 0; } while (0)
00082 
00083 #define rt_spin_lock_irq(lock) \
00084         do { rtai_cli(); rt_spin_lock(lock); } while (0)
00085  
00086 #define rt_spin_unlock_irq(lock) \
00087         do { rt_spin_unlock(lock); rtai_sti(); } while (0)
00088  
00089 static inline unsigned long rt_spin_lock_irqsave(void *lock)
00090 {
00091         unsigned long flags;
00092         rtai_save_flags_and_cli(flags);
00093         rt_spin_lock(lock);
00094         return flags;
00095 }
00096  
00097 #define rt_spin_unlock_irqrestore(flags, lock) \
00098         do { rt_spin_unlock(lock); rtai_restore_flags(flags); } while (0)
00099  
00100 #ifdef __cplusplus
00101 }
00102 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00103 
00104 #endif /* !__KERNEL__ */
00105 
00106 #endif /* !_RTAI_USI_H */
